mapper.select: /* InstDao.selectInstInfo */ SELECT A.INSTID ,A.INST_NM ,A.INST_CD ,A.INST_TYPE_CD ,A.RGN_CD ,A.BRNO ,A.RPRSV_NM ,A.TELNO ,A.FXNO ,A.ZIP ,A.ADDR ,A.ADDR_DTL ,A.HMPG ,A.LOGO_FILEID ,A.FILEGRPID ,A.APRV_STTS_CD ,A.USE_YN ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.MDFRID ,A.REG_DT ,A.RGTRID FROM TB_CMM_INST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.INSTID = #{instid}

/* InstDao.selectInstRegisterMemberList */
SELECT A.USERID ,A.ACNT ,A.NM ,A.EML ,A.MOBLPHON ,A.DEL_YN ,A.INSTID ,A.INSTPIC_ROLE_CD ,A.STTS_CD ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.STTS_CD <> '9'
AND ( A.INSTID IS NULL OR A.INSTID <> #{instid} )
AND A.NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.ACNT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.MOBLPHON LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.EML LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
/* InstDao.checkInstSiteRegisterYn */ SELECT MAX(YN) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(SITEID) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS YN FROM TB_CMM_SITE WHERE 1=1 AND INSTID = #{instid} )A
/* InstDao.checkDuplicatedBrnoYn */ SELECT MAX(YN) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(BRNO) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS YN FROM TB_CMM_INST WHERE 1=1 AND BRNO = #{brno} )A
